otherNames: Pokémon: Black & White, ポケットモンスターベストウイッシュ
synopsis:
Pokemon: Best wishes is a serier between couples Pokemon of Mijumaru and Pokabu, Sutaaja along with Zekrom.  Iris and Reimsu have a Kibano and are later combine with Ash and Pikachu. Victini appears later in this. And What happens then?
